content-selector.description: Selector used to style the content below the top app bar, to prevent the top app bar from covering it.

fixed.description: Fixed top app bars stay at the top of the page and elevate above the content when scrolled.

dense.description: The dense top app bar is shorter.

prominent.description: The prominent top app bar is taller.

prominent-dense.description: The prominent top app bar with dense.

short.description: Short top app bars are top app bars that can collapse to the navigation icon side when scrolled.

short-collapsed.description: Short top app bars can be configured to always appear collapsed.

nav-icon.description: A navigation icon. (Set 'close' for the contextual action bar)

nav-id.description: Control the navigation drawer is opened or closed.
